Text: A New Program is on the Airto HELLO ENRON is the latest trend among Enron employees This radiostyle news program was created with you in mind so get plugged in through your telephone or computer The new program will bring you up to speed on the Chairmans Award and the new office tower being constructed in downtown Houston Also hear from Portland General Electric President Peggy Fowler and three PGE linemen There are two ways to listen on your telephone by dialing HELO or toll free see attached for international numbers on your computer through streaming audio visit homeenroncom for access Note This option may not work on all PCs If you experience problems please use the telephone version or read the transcripts provided on homeenroncom
